member.name: P:Hbm.Api.Scan.Entities.Service.Port
member.summary: Port at which the service is available

member.name: T:Hbm.Api.Scan.Scan
member.summary: Class uses common HBM scan to find devices connected to Ethernet. At present PMX and QX devices can be found (DMP will follow).

member.name: M:Hbm.Api.Scan.Scan.Init
member.exception: Thrown if HBM_Scan_Init or HBM_Scan_StartServersAll fail.

member.name: M:Hbm.Api.Scan.Scan.Exit
member.summary: Cleans up the running threads in scan dll... Call this function before closing main application

member.name: M:Hbm.Api.Scan.Scan.ScanForDevices(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Function executes a scan over all network interfaces (network adapters).
member.param: Device family to scan for. Scan returns only devices of this family (e.g. "QuantumX" or "PMX"). To get devices of all families, set DeviceFamily=""
If set to true excludes unconnectable devices.
member.returns: List of devices that have been found.
member.exception: Problems during scan! Errornumber=" + lastResult.ToString() + " " + ex.Message
Thrown if errors during scan occur.
member.remarks: Devices that are not reachable (due to incompatible ip settings) will also be returned!

member.name: M:Hbm.Api.Scan.Scan.ScanForConnectableDevices(System.String)
member.summary: Function executes a scan over all network interfaces (network adapters).
member.param: Device family to scan for. Scan returns only devices of this family (e.g. "QuantumX" or "PMX"). To get devices of all families, set DeviceFamily=""
member.returns: List of connectable devices that have been found.
member.remarks: Devices that are found by scan but not reachable (due to incompatible IP settings) will not be returned!
member.exception: Thrown if errors during scan occur.

member.name: M:Hbm.Api.Scan.Scan.ChangeDeviceIpAddress(System.String,System.Boolean,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Changes the ipAdress of a device
member.param: Serial number of the device, required for the scan dll
indicator if it is an automatic or manual network assignment
member.exception: Problems during scan! Assingn device interface failed Errornumber = " + lastResult.ToString() + " " + ex.Message

member.name: M:Hbm.Api.Scan.Scan.ScanForNetworkAdapters
member.summary: Function returns a list of network adapters (only activated adapters!)
member.returns: List of active network adapters of the PC
member.exception: Thrown if errors during scan for network adapters occur.

member.name: M:Hbm.Api.Scan.Scan.DetectUnconnectableDevicesAndInterfaces(System.Collections.Generic.List{Hbm.Api.Scan.Entities.Device},System.Collections.Generic.List{Hbm.Api.Scan.Entities.NetworkAdapter},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Flags the devices that are not connectable to any of the given list of network adapters
member.param: List of available network adpaters, that could be used to connect the given list of devices
if set to true [delete non connectable devices].

member.name: M:Hbm.Api.Scan.Scan.IsIp4AddressConnectable(Hbm.Api.Scan.Entities.Ip4Address,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.List{Hbm.Api.Scan.Entities.NetworkAdapter})
member.summary: Function checks if the given IPAddress, SubnetMask and MacAddress fits to any of the given network adapters
member.param: IPAddress of a device to check for connectivity
Mac address of the device network adapter
List of network adapters of the PC
member.returns: True, if IPAddress is connectable from any network adapter
